item.name: Inherited Cape of the Black Baron

effects.display_string: Set: Rested experience consumed is reduced by 30%.
Set: Increases your out-of-combat regeneration in the outdoors, normal dungeons and battlegrounds.
Set: Gaining a level triggers Burst of Knowledge, dealing 9,436 Holy damage to nearby enemies and granting you 40% Agility for 2 min. Defeating enemies extends this effect, up to an additional 2 min.
Set: Rested experience consumed is reduced by an additional 30%.
